name: BeeHive
short_description: This project provides any POSIX operating system with Windows NT registry editing. This is a collection of programs, script modules and APIs to allow editing, repair and optimization of roaming profiles (NTUSER.DAT) and other NT hive (registry) files.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
